itemDisplayName: TLG (Test Lab Guide) 3 VM Base Configuration
description: This template deploys the TLG (Test Lab Guide) 3 VM Base Configuration solution, a Test Lab Guide (TLG) solution used as a base build for a variety of test labs. This template provisions a Windows Server 2012 R2 Active Directory domain controller using the specified domain name, an application server running Windows Server 2012 R2, and optionally a client VM running Windows 10.
summary: Deploys 3 VMs: Server 2012 R2 AD DC, Server 2012 R2 app server and Windows 10 client. Provisions an AD domain and joins member VMs.
